objects.text: Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs
• 925 Sterling Silver • Gift for Her • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 68 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a soft, feminine aesthetic centered around a jewelry product image (`product_image`) displayed within a white circular frame outlined in light rose. At the top, the primary headline (`heading`) is bold and centered, using a tall, uppercase font in a muted rose-red. Just below it, the subheading (`subheading`) introduces the product with a darker brownish-pink color, emphasizing elegance. On the right side, a peach-toned gradient circle (`price_circle`) contains the bold white pricing text (`price`), giving prominence to cost. Supporting details (`description`) are styled in compact formatting across the bottom, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) prominently invites users to shop.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose: `#FFD1D1`
- Warm Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Deep Rosewood: `#873740`
- Coral Red: `#C95B64`
- Gold Peach Gradient: from `#F9D1BC` to `#E8A987`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings with a soft and feminine color palette. The primary color is a delicate rose gold (#EFA7A1), which forms the base and outlines of the floral design. This is smoothly blended with translucent white crystals (#FFFFFF) and sparkling diamond-like stones highlighted with subtle silver-gray tones (#D3D3D3). The marquise-cut gems add a luxurious detail, merging harmoniously with the round stones. The gentle pink petal elements (#F5C5C0) enhance the soft, romantic appeal of the design. These tones together create a luxurious yet delicate look, ideal for a classy advertisement banner with pastel or light-themed backgrounds.
